body_html:
Python 3 was added to Dockerfile in #6030. I noticed that compared with Dockerfile, the Dockerfile.devel does not have

# RUN ln -s /usr/bin/python3 /usr/bin/python#

That is the reason python --version output difference. (python 2 in latest-devel-py3 and python 3 in latest-py3)

I don't know if that was intentional in #6030, though.

Python 3 was added to Dockerfile in #6030. I noticed that compared with Dockerfile, the Dockerfile.devel does not have
# RUN ln -s /usr/bin/python3 /usr/bin/python#

I don't know if that was intentional in #6030, though.
body:
Python 3 was added to Dockerfile in #6030. I noticed that compared with `Dockerfile`, the `Dockerfile.devel` does not have 
```
# RUN ln -s /usr/bin/python3 /usr/bin/python#
```
That is the reason `python --version` output difference. (python 2 in latest-devel-py3 and python 3 in latest-py3)

I don't know if that was intentional in #6030, though.
